name: S. Bullet's Space Party Chaos
description:
A game about repairing your spaceship before it collides with the sun! In this game you and three other friends play as voyagers aboard a borken spaceship that must be fixed quickly before you all get to close to the sun! Each player must deal with one of the spaceship's broken panels, co-operating with each other and passing the phone around and trading tools to solve every problem before time runs out. 

HOW TO PLAY: - Connect the right parts to the panels to win. - Drag and drop the parts to the colllective tool belt, so you can trade them between players - Beware of a dangerous space creature!

Credits: 

Art by Luiz Petronilho & Willian Akira Mizutani Coding by Aron Daniel Lopes, Bruno Willian Andrade e Victor Dias Savariego Sounds and Level Design by Isabela Makiolka Montingelli
